TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssemblyInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.Installer

summary.span: 加载一个程序集，并运行其中的所有安装程序。

span.span: Loads an assembly, and runs all the installers in it.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 通过调用构造函数来创建。In the following example, an is created by invoking the constructor. 设置此对象的属性, 并调用和方法以安装`MyAssembly.exe`程序集。The properties of this object are set and the and methods are called to install the `MyAssembly.exe` assembly. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void CheckIfInstallable(string assemblyName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub CheckIfInstallable (assemblyName As String)

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 要在其中搜索安装程序的程序集。

span.span: The assembly in which to search for installers.

summary.span: 检查是否可以安装指定的程序集。

span.span: Checks to see if the specified assembly can be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否可以安装指定的程序集。The method determines whether the specified assembly can be installed. 若要避免引发异常, 文件必须满足以下条件:To avoid an exception being thrown, the file must meet the following criteria: - 该文件已存在。The file exists. - 文件是 .NET Framework 程序集。The file is a .NET Framework assembly. - 可从文件中读取公共类型。The public types can be read from the file. - 至少有一个公共的非抽象类扩展类并包含特性。There is at least one public, non abstract class that extends the class and contains the attribute. - 可以创建每个安装程序的实例。An instance of each installer can be created. > [!NOTE] > 如果程序集有效但不包含安装程序, 则会引发异常。If the assembly is valid but contains no installers, an exception is thrown. 此行为与安装时的行为不同, 因为安装空程序集不是错误。This behavior differs from that at install time, when it is not an error to install an empty assembly. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 方法将应用于存在的程序集和不存在的程序集, 并将调用结果显示到控制台。In the following example, the method is applied to both an existent and nonexistent assembly and the results of the call are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CPP/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CS/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/VB/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不能安装指定的程序集。

span.span: The specified assembly cannot be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当此实例中的所有安装程序的方法都成功时, 才会调用此方法。This method is called only if the methods of all the installers in this instance's succeed. 此方法然后调用集合中每个安装程序的方法。This method then calls the method of each installer in the collection. 将您可能需要执行的任何信息存储在保存状态下的正确卸载操作, 并将其传递给方法。Store any information that you might need to do a correct uninstall operation in the saved-state , which is passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数以及类的和方法。The following example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods of the class. 类是通过调用构造函数创建的。 An class is created by invoking the constructor. 设置此对象的属性, 并调用和方法以安装`MyAssembly_Install.exe`程序集。The properties of this object are set and the and methods are called to install the `MyAssembly_Install.exe` assembly. summary.span: 获取安装程序集合中所有安装程序的帮助文字。

span.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

value.span: 安装程序集合中所有安装程序的帮助文本，包括每个安装程序的用途说明以及可以传递给每个安装程序并为其所识别的（安装程序的）命令行选项。

span.span: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what each installer does and the command-line options (for the installation program) that can be passed to and understood by each installer.

Performs the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用此实例的属性中包含的每个安装程序的方法。This method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. 在包含的安装程序`savedState`运行后, 将更新由参数指定的对象,以反映安装的状态。The object specified by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run. 如果所有方法均成功 , 则调用方法。If all the methods succeed, the method is called. 否则, 将调用方法。Otherwise, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数以及类的和方法。The following example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods of the class. 类的对象是通过调用构造函数创建的。An object of the class is created by invoking the constructor. 设置此对象的属性, 并调用和方法来安装 "MyAssembly_Install" 程序集。The properties of this object are set and the and methods are called to install the 'MyAssembly_Install.exe' assembly. Public Overrides Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，它包含计算机的安装前状态。

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 将计算机还原为安装前的状态。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回滚将计算机还原到安装前的状态。A rollback restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation occurred. 如果此 实例或安装程序集合中的任何安装程序的方法无法正确运行, 则调用方法。The method is called if the method of this instance or of any installer in the installer collection fails to run correctly. 通过在集合中调用安装程序的方法而生成的任何异常将被忽略, 并且其他安装程序的回滚将继续。Any exceptions generated by calling the method of an installer in the collection are ignored, and the rollback of the other installers continues. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 调用方法以撤消指定程序集上的安装过程。In the following sample, the method is called to undo the install process on the specified assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CPP/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CS/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/VB/assemblyinstaller_rollback.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，它包含计算机的安装后状态。

span.span: An that contains the post-installation state of the computer.
Removes an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可删除先前完成的安装。Call this method to remove a previously completed installation. 如果集合中的某个安装程序的方法失败, 仍将为其余的安装程序调用该方法。If the method fails for one of the installers in the collection, it is still called for the remaining installers. 如果卸载失败, 则不会将计算机回滚到其预卸载状态。A failed uninstallation does not roll back the computer to its pre-uninstallation state. > [!NOTE] > `savedState`尽管和方法在安装之后保存计算机的状态, 但在安装完成后, 可能会在某个时间点删除包含参数的文件。 Although the and methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete. 如果文件已删除, 则`savedState`参数为。 `null`If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 在安装并提交作为参数传递给构造函数的程序集后, 将调用方法。In the following sample, the method is called after installing and committing the assembly passed as the parameter to the constructor. exception.span: 该异常被忽略，卸载继续进行。

span.span: The exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.

exception.span: 但是，卸载完成后应用程序可能未完全卸载。

span.span: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstall completes.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为程序集安装创建新的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a new object for the assembly's installation.

value.span: 如果要为程序集安装创建一个新的 对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a new object should be created for the assembly's installation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将`true`创建名为 "{Assembly name}" 的新文件。Installutil.installlog "来记录此程序集的消息。Setting this property to `true` creates a new file named "{Assembly name}.InstallLog" to log messages for this assembly. 用于`false`阻止创建新文件的设置。Setting to `false` prevents the new file from being created. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 通过调用构造函数来创建。In the following example, an is created by invoking the constructor. 此对象的属性设置为`true` , 并对该`MyAssembly_HelpText.exe`程序集调用方法。The property of this object is set to `true` and the method is invoked on the `MyAssembly_HelpText.exe` assembly. 由于此原因, 日志消息显示在控制台上。Due to this, the log messages are displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CPP/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CS/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/VB/assemblyinstaller_helptext.vb#1)]
